issue.title: [C++] Add azure-sdk-for-cpp to ThirdpartyToolchain
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14270](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14270). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a requirement to be able to make progress on ARROW-9611
